name: The Bubble Keeper
description:
The Bubble Keeper is a small game where bubbles are the number one mechanic. Your job is to try to keep as many of your bubbles on the screen  and if you lose 4 bubbles you will lose.

Controls are as follows

You can control 1 bubble at a time by clicking the bubble and then holding your mouse down while holding your mouse you can control that bubble with WASD

This game was made for Mini jam 

Mini Jam 33: Underwater

All assest , scripts etc were made inside the time frame of the jam 

Windows build -- Tested and working

Web Build -- Tested and working

Mac Build -- Not Tested

Linux Build -- Not Tested
